plugins.name: avid-nux-global-libs
plugins.description: NUX legacy externals libs wrapped into plugin
plugins.author: volodymyr.shugaiev@avid.com

plugins.name: avid-moment
plugins.description: moment js plugin for cloud ux

scripts.build: webpack --entry ./src/index.js --output-filename bundle.js --mode production --output-library avid-ui-redux-store --output-library-target umd --devtool source-map
